        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="632" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="632" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.74</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="21061">21,061</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1360"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Bright Crystal</b> by <b>Versace</b> is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. <b>Bright Crystal</b> was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Yuzu, Pomegranate and Ice; middle notes are Peony, Lotus and Magnolia; base notes are Musk, Mahogany and Amber. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The pink colored bottle announces softer and more luminous fragrance in comparison with Crystal Noir. Nowadays popular fruity note gives the composition slightly gourmand nuance. The top notes are pomegranate, Yuzu and frosted accord. Peony and magnolia are in the centre of the composition, while waterly fresh lotus note moderates the intensity and sweetnes of the floral accords. The opulent base introduces amber note extracted from plants, musk and red woods. The fragrance was designed by Alberto Morillas in 2006.</p>

                    </div>
                    Harsh citrus opening note
                </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="632"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.83.jpg" style="width: 4.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Yuzu-83.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Yuzu</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.193.jpg" style="width: 4.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pomegranate-193.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pomegranate</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.856.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ice-856.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ice</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.155.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Peony-155.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Peony</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.27.jpg" style="width: 4.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lotus-27.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lotus</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.95315215481957; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.147.jpg" style="width: 3.65rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Magnolia-147.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Magnolia</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88630790722059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.43.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mahogany-43.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mahogany</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="632"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='9545d24b6828d1252cf91fb668d391f1835' slotpayload='{"ct":"Z0ncJ0c6df8he\/HIxBkqXa6Rsl5FljDuzDC3MUGfPGXvlmsM9RT+cScCB9socIoTPMhpD4EX81ngi9sq2VedwmP+kI9YjR1wD6W+j+deOsBpqF5lSj9Uo7JWLvjR\/GkSjrCsgRfYW\/YoOmhWVeSn0rLEtd\/1inTwxUko7ohY7nxHo8iDOwrDU5yeuj8vWetBBI8ofxd\/+yUQFpLSE\/fwifOhTV\/q9uVXtYk8avVVwEHYGhXW\/lk\/FbDz9RJJcezqjGwxbDQaiBLSjq1j7vldfAfCbV9DRHlW3nF2SrhjE\/ycgxeQLSqKMDQngJaY6Mll","iv":"617d714d002ae5991336e3a96df9948f","s":"8d333ac2489ad5ca"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="632"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.89</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="632"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.02</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> Bright Crystal</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-Absolu-21547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.21547.jpg"alt="Bright Crystal Absolu Versace" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Versace</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Bright Crystal Absolu</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-Parfum-92277.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.92277.jpg"alt="Bright Crystal Parfum Versace" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Versace</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Bright Crystal Parfum</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="632"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="632"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="632" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353690" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970">WitchQueen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1731989126" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's pretty. It's young, a little basic, but good. But it's not for me. Very floral, a little fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2353690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2353690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352771" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pockydoyo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2327217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pockydoyo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); great for everyday use.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2352771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2352771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193025">CandyPerfumeGirl89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 23:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This used to be my signature scent. It is one of the only perfumes I have repurchased many times in my life. This smells like my grandma but in the best way. She is a classy beautiful lady whose also fresh and fun. . My boyfriend enjoys this one. It may be from the memories associated with it though ;).   Bright crystal was recently somewhat ruined for me when a coworker started wearing it all the time. Now it's her signature scent and I've moved on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2345964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2345964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Bright crystal is iconic and has dominated the market since 2006. Its the perfect everyday scent, its what I reach for when I dont feel like smelling like a marshmallow or burnt rubber.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2338209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2338209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's young, fresh, simple, fruity and I've outgrown it but it is still nostalgic for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2336079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2336079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Taupey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Taupey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286347">Taupey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Peony is one of my absolute favorite notes but this fragrance is really bad. Extremely synthetic,  no balance, the lotus with the pomegranate is just a weird combination and overall it smells very metallic (in a bad way), though I'm sure that it's some secret DNA of Versace as most of their fragrances have this vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2335328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2335328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335249" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lala-jaenner"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/507083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.507083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lala-jaenner" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/507083">lala-jaenner</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 00:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Look I agree that this fragrance might smell outdated, like a 2000s perfume (it is one), but I prefer it over most modern fragrances that is for me from 2015 on, because they all smell the same, chemical oudish and or sticky gourmand.<br />
It just smells good, put together but also a little bit cheeky, not over the top but recognisable. <br />
I used to find it boring when I was younger and wilder, I was a Gucci Rush and Dior Addict young woman, but now I really appreciate it. It is real and reassuring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2335249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2335249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dedania"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2296849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dedania" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/English-Pear-Sweet-Pea-84035.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84035.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="English Pear & Sweet Pea"title="English Pear & Sweet Pea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296849">dedania</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like cleaning spray solution for me.. It was gifted to me but I don't like it very much. Smells strong and clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2334573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2334573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322901" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nordlanderin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961131.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nordlanderin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961131">nordlanderin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 11:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the few perfumes I like on my warm skin better than in a bottle/on paper. It's a fresh citrusy perfume with low amber and wood accord but it turns into an icy pomegranate once I spray it on myself. Still, I don't like it enough to buy it. Many will disagree but I feel like perfumes do become outdated, and I have a strong dislike for perfumes launched in 2000s, I don't know why, but they just... Smell like perfumes from 2000s. If I were into this direction, I'd rather find an alternative from recent launches</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2322901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2322901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313490" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313490" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mammumetsas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2272740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mammumetsas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zadig-Voltaire/This-Is-Her-Undressed-78743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="This Is Her! It was my favorite perfume when i was younger (about 16-17), but I still quite like it now. it is more suitable for younger people i guess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is a 4/5 for me. Summertime scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2302872"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2302872#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tgirl1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tgirl1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828">tgirl1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 20:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the safest blind buy out there. Even just look at the numbers, basically no one hates this fragrance. Based on the numbers here, statistically it's a pretty safe one. What makes it a good blind buy is basically there's very little NOT to like about it, namely because it's really not particularly special. There are many scents that have something like... sandalwood, vanilla, soapy smells etc that while many people like them, many people don't. Bright Crystal is NOT that. Even for those who don't like florals, this one isn't offensively floral. It strikes a pretty perfect balance between sweet, fruity and floral and doesn't lean predominantly in any one of those directions. There's always a chance that it won't work with your body chemistry, but that's every fragrance, and just from scanning the reviews here, again, seems statistically unlikely.<br />
<br />
I don't think this is the kind of beautiful unique fragrance that you want to smother yourself with. But it's a pleasant one that most people are going to like and does the job. You also very much don't need many sprays of this and a few will suffice. It could have the tendency to be overpowering if you're spraying it more than 3 times. Anyway, conclusion, this is a perfectly acceptable, pretty fragrance thats unlikely to stand out but also unlikely to offend anyone.<br />
<br />
Scent Description: Sweet Fruity Floral<br />
Sillage: Medium - Be wary of over-spraying<br />
Longevity: 3-5 Hours - after a few hours mostly just sweet/fruity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2300718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2300718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300578" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300578" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yes2heaven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1708924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yes2heaven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goest/Dauphine-55664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dauphine"title="Dauphine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300578ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300578" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708924">yes2heaven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>like when you go to an Italian restaurant and they have melograno hand soap in the bathroom and as you're washing your hands you're thinking about what a delightful word "melograno" is and how fun it is to say it in an Italian accent, but you forget all about it by the time you're back at your table<br />
<br />
I like this. it's feminine and flirty and puts a smile on my face, but the longevity is laughably bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2300578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2300578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299566" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtthe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567009"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtthe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567009">Myrtthe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 20:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mediocre. Not unique/original. Peony musk bomb. And smells like a cheaper, more synthetic version of Dior's Blooming Bouquet. 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2299566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2299566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294479" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aratarei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2266003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aratarei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Blooming-Bouquet-2023-78945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"title="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266003">aratarei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 06:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember the first time I tried Bright Crystal by Versace. It was a warm, sunny afternoon, and I was out running errands. I decided to pop into a department store to browse the fragrance section. As I spritzed Bright Crystal on my wrist, I was immediately struck by the fresh, fruity opening. The pomegranate and yuzu hit me like a burst of sunshine. It felt bright and cheerful, almost like a refreshing drink on a hot day. As it settled, the floral notes began to bloom. The peony and lotus added a lovely, feminine touch that felt light and airy. It was just the kind of scent I was looking forsomething fresh and floral without being overpowering. I could easily see myself wearing it on a casual brunch or a day out with friends, feeling pretty and put together.<br />
<br />
But heres where it gets real: the longevity was a bit disappointing. After a few hours, I noticed it started to fade. I found myself reapplying it more often than Id like. The bottle is gorgeous, though! The jewel-like cap is so pretty and makes it feel special sitting on my vanity. Its like a little piece of luxury, even if the scent itself is more casual.<br />
<br />
Overall, Id say Bright Crystal is perfect for those laid-back days when you want something uplifting and feminine. Just be prepared to give it a spritz or two throughout the day. Its a lovely addition to my collection, and I can see myself reaching for it often, especially in spring and summer when I crave those fresh, floral scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2294479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2294479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289464" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nekomimikan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2253975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nekomimikan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Merchant-of-Venice/Gyokuro-73027.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73027.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gyokuro"title="Gyokuro"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289464ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289464" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253975">Nekomimikan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is suuuch a lovely scent. Fresh, bright, crisp, feminine. <br />
I wish it had better sillage and longevity but I still keep buying it. <br />
The yuzu and pomegranate gives it such a nice fresh opening without being sour or sharp. The following lotus note gives it such a nice floraly aquatic touch that makes it like an icy floral lemonade on a hot summer day. Absolutely juicy, refreshing, never boring, youthful, perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2289464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2289464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286004" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="verymadz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="verymadz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Liis/Ethereal-Wave-84531.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84531.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ethereal Wave"title="Ethereal Wave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249925">verymadz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 11:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright Crystal: my signature since I discovered it back in high school!<br />
<br />
After going through 5 or 6 bottles over the years, I still come back to it for a reassuring spritz. I just bought my next bottle.<br />
<br />
Is this scent groundbreaking? No. But I love it anyways - and have received so many compliments over the years!<br />
<br />
What I like best is that it makes me feel like *me*. I can spray this on no matter what I'm wearing or what mood I'm in, and it will always compliment it perfectly. Perhaps that's because I've worn the same perfume for over 10 years, or maybe it's the light simplicity of this scent. Maybe a bit of both!<br />
<br />
I've read others' thoughts about Bright Crystal, and while I agree it's nothing special, it's lovely in its consistency and versatility. It's light, fresh, and citrusy, and always makes me feel clean. I've smelled a lot of the "smells like" scents, and none of them compare; the Dior and Chloe and other light pink scents Bright Crystal is grouped with are much more generic, while Bright Crystal has an air of complexity. Perhaps it's the yuzu? I'm no expert, so I won't opine. All that I can say is that I love this scent, and I'll continue buying and wearing it for years to come!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2286004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2286004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malebinha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2008216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="malebinha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2008216">malebinha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 08:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eu amo o fato das pessoas subestimarem a fragrncia aps superestimarem o frasco rs<br />
 uma fragrncia linda! Floral cor de rosa suave, refrescante, agradvel e perfeito para assinatura.<br />
O frasco faz jus  jia que guarda.<br />
<br />
No considero uma fragrncia batida, at porque muitas gostariam de ser uma princesa mas poucas esto verdadeiramente dispostas a cheirar como uma. <br />
- Floral, mesmo que "bsico" no  pra todos.<br />
<br />
Eu amo o gelo e almscar dessa fragrncia, a rom aquosa e levemente adocicada que arredonda essas flores maceradas, deixa tudo to leve e agradvel,  perfeito para o vero.<br />
<br />
Fixao boa para um edt, em mdia 7h e sinto exalar a cada movimento.<br />
<br />
Eu realmente me sinto especial e feliz vestindo essa fragrncia. Tenho meus momentos Fresh princess </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2282557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2282557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281698" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kkwofenti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kkwofenti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252882">Kkwofenti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive used about half of my 90ml bottle and Im still very unimpressed.This was gifted to me and I only wear to the gym or class because nobody can smell it anyway. I feel like all the notes project at like 4% because it isnt straight Alcohol its alcohol with a tiny hint of floral. But Its crazy how its barely there.This is unlike any Versace on the market and honestly it smells like it should be 30 dollars. Truly nothing special or even good to like I only wear it because I dont want to waste my actual good fragrances for everyday use. If there was a placebo scent this would be it. I just like spraying something on me to start the day and this lets me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2281698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2281698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281640" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281640" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bangabanga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776628"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1776628.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bangabanga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281640ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281640" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776628">Bangabanga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty, and pretty basic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2281640"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2281640#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280960" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BravoAlissa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2157517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BravoAlissa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-485.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.485.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue"title="Light Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157517">BravoAlissa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 19:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought this was such a shiny, important thing when I first came to Perfumery. I *Wanted* it!! <br />
<br />
 But on me it just wasn't *special, no matter how often I wore this. It always felt "meh." And it never lasts more than 30m or so on my skin.<br />
<br />
Then I learned what people in the industry say about this perfume. Jean Claude Ellena calls it "a saccharine bomb, lacking substance" and I realized my nose had been right all along and had already told me what to think, to not to fall for the designer hype, and lastly the industry pros confirmed my doubts.<br />
<br />
It's just not all that. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2280960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2280960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="punky9791"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="punky9791" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Michael-Kors/Sexy-Amber-18161.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18161.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sexy Amber"title="Sexy Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298684">punky9791</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My friend had spritzed some from a sample onto her wrist, and she smelled so good a few hours later that I asked if I could use some since I loved the amber notes that seemed to radiate from my friend! On me, however, this turned incredibly fruity.  I didn't get any of the amber notes/base notes later on. It just stayed sweet and fruity. I'm not a fan of peony or magnolia, and those notes stuck out.  Not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2270289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2270289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emiliaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emiliaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);
