Basically similar quality as zara perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2265679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2265679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="macyplier"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2237141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="macyplier" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237141">macyplier</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 23:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried to like this I really did. I mean I used the whole bottle so I'm sure that counts for something, but to me this just smells like alcohol? I could not tell you what it's supposed to smell like aside from generic flowery perfume with lots of alcohol. I could also be biased because I don't think I enjoy florals so take this with maybe a couple grains of salt because I do know people who liked it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2265440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2265440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265206" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy224"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1591256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy224" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591256">Andy224</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hard not to like this nice and floral scent. Might not be too groundbreaking yet it is still very likable and feminine. Safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2265206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2265206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259709" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KaroKat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730021"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1730021.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KaroKat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730021">KaroKat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked Bright Crystal at first. Now I'm a little bored with it. Probably because it's been done dozens of times by countless perfume houses. Take note of all of the "this perfume reminds me of..." and how many perfumes are just like this. I have Dior's Addict Eau Fraiche and Jimmy Choo Leau, both are very similar to BC. Out of the three I actually enjoy Jimmy Choo the most. If you have any of the fragrances in the smells like category, you probably won't need Bright Crystal</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2259709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2259709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wildangel72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/886089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.886089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wildangel72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Pure-XS-For-Her-51424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure XS For Her"title="Pure XS For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/886089">wildangel72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm late to the party, but I recently relented and decided to test some Versace scents. I've generally avoided them because Versace fashions always seemed over-the-top, busy, and sometimes downright gaudy--so I figured their perfumes would be equally loud and overdone.<br />
The oversized top-heavy "crystal" caps on the bottles from this line reflect my general impression of the house.  Those huge plastic gems just come off as cheap and pretentious to me, like when women wear massive fake diamonds and expect people to be fooled and impressed. Not a fan of the bottle design.  <br />
As for the scent, this one is very underwhelming. The bottle tries to present big and spectacular, but the scent is nondescript and pedestrian. It opens as a chaotic jumble of florals with a hint of synthetic fruit, and quickly fades to a generic pink musk. It's a little soapy, a little powdery, a little boring.  For me the notes are not distinguishable, but neither does it seem well blended.  It seems thrown together and not quite matching, like a lot of Versace clothes. <br />
Sillage is relatively weak; people standing right next to you will catch a whiff, for a minute anyway.  Longevity is equally poor; it fades so fast that it's hard to even fully decide how you feel about it before it's gone.  From a big name like Versace, I would expect more--then again, it's true to the impression that Versace is overpriced for what you get.  <br />
Bottom line, the scent is ok...ish....but there are drugstore, no-name body sprays that smell the same and might even last longer.  Feeling some blind buy regret .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2245861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2245861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Canadian Breeze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2217221.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Canadian Breeze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/L-Amour-16931.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16931.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Amour"title="L'Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217221">Canadian Breeze</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a sweet and youthful fragrance. On first spray it was very strong - too strong for me. But after five minutes it had calmed down and softened. After half an hour it had faded almost to nothing. <br />
<br />
This is a scent that reminds me of the perfumes I admired as a teenager - a tad too sweet and just a bit hyper. I can readily see why some people love it (for its straight-forward pleasant and sweet appeal), and for others it has associations with cheap artificiality. <br />
<br />
For me, this is not going to be a scent I'll wear, but when I encounter it on a younger woman, it'll just make me smile and remind me of the days when I myself was sweet, filled with youthful optimism, and maybe even just a bit hyper myself...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2245054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2245054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244460" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244460" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jow012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jow012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244460ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244460" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924">jow012</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The tester I smelled in the store smells so different from the bottle I just purchased. There is some kind of sticky, synthetic plastic-like note in the dry-down. When this warms up on the skin it loses those fresh cold top notes within minutes. I'm contemplating on whether to return or not. I may have to strictly only wear this in cold weather to prevent the cold top notes from warming up on my skin, but don't know that it is worth it to keep. What's with the dry down and base notes? Is it the mahogany? I thought mahogany would smell more like a neutral wood. There is no wood at all. I'm going to let it sit for a week and return if it still smells off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2244460"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2244460#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243468" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yanlovescents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581019.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yanlovescents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Another-13-10131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Another 13"title="Another 13"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581019">yanlovescents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this on paper and it was such an amazing fresh floral fragrance so I bought the 90ml bottle. But sadly, once I sprayed it on skin, it dried down very woody and too strong on the patchouli for me :( also something in the fragrance made my nose sting. Maybe, I'll let it macerate and hopefully it will smell like the tester in store.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2243468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2243468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Had high expectations because everyone on tiktok was hyping it up but it did nothing for me. My best friend LOVED IT though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2237987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2237987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aquapinkmoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aquapinkmoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/My-Burberry-Blush-45820.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45820.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Burberry Blush"title="My Burberry Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely ADORE this perfume. Its a dewy, watery floral that just smells so elegant, pretty and youthful, although this is an EDT it performs as if it were an EDP, Im smelling this on my shirt without difficulty 8 hours after spraying. Im not sure what ice notes are supposed to smell like, but this perfume has a cooling water effect to it that is so calming and Im not sure if anyone else has noticed, but this has lots of similarities to acqua di gioia by Armani!! If you love the acqua di gioia youll definitely appreciate this gem, its like a soft floral version. The peony in this has made me fall in love with the note and Im so excited to get myself a bottle of the new parfum version<br />
Also can we please appreciate how ADORABLE this bottle is</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2232376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2232376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2136642">Woahitssteph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My girlfriend said I smell like "seashells on the beach" when I wear this. I'm kind of obsessed with that description, though I don't know if I love this perfume enough to buy the full size. I do love how fresh and feminine it is, and the name and bottle suit it so perfectly. It's the perfect everyday perfume, but it's not unique enough for me. It lasts like 3 hours on my skin and I do get compliments when I wear it. It's definitely a safe blind buy IMO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2230608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2230608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But it's ok for hot summer days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2225813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2225813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gsalera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/79064"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.79064.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gsalera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/79064">gsalera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 01:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased a bottle of Bright Crystal a few years ago and I agree it is a safe, clean and inoffensive scent. I have a preference for more intimate scents and Bright Crystal is definitely that on me - it might require reapplying after some time but I have always worked in environments where heavy scents are a no-no and Bright Crystal suited my needs at the time. I never heard complaints but I also only heard compliments from people who I know well enough to hug projection seems to be limited to arms length at most. I have found myself less interested in Bright Crystal in the past year or two, rarely reaching for it. As it is nearly empty, I recently decided to upgrade and my search was quickly over when I found Delina La Rose - after wearing it for a couple of days, I decided to try Bright Crystal for comparison purposes, as it had been a few months since I last used it, and it is definitely a nice and safe fragrance but I wont repurchase it. I love peonies and Delina La Rose is just the right amount of fresh and floral for me - I just love it! Bright Crystal is cute and all but it is at best a like</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2225767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2225767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My mom likes it for every day use</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2223018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2223018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171712">elliesalah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 01:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing perfume. florally, citrusy, light and fresh. it's a dream perfume for those who love citrusy floral perfumes without the woodiness or harshness like me. I wasn't familiar with Yuzu, it is the openning of this perfume almost feels like someone is peeling it when your spray it which i don't mind at all it's a special kind of citrus i don't think i've seen it with orange nor lemon, the mahogny and amber are mild and light and not annoying me with their intensity. What i like about this perfume is how it rests on the skin the same way you spray the perfume it doesn't change that much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2221956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2221956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204206" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="berganaughty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882396"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="berganaughty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Red-Jeans-638.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.638.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Jeans"title="Red Jeans"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882396">berganaughty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a bunch of Versace samples a while ago and this was really unimpressive to me compared to the others. Trying it again a few weeks later in the heat and I'm definitely enjoying it more but still don't think I'd ever purchase a larger size. The peony smells generic here and just lingers as a typical shampoo-y smell for not nearly long enough. I do think it smells like pomegranate but without a notes pyramid there'd be nothing to stop me from thinking this is just a generic fruity floral</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2204206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2204206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ioniccolette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ioniccolette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659539">ioniccolette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 19:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yuzu is one of my favorite drink flavors, so enjoying it in a fragrance was a new experience at the time. That said, I honestly didn't know BC had yuzu nestled among the top notes until after trying a sample I received in the mail. <br />
<br />
More frivolously: if I refused to obsess over Fragantica pages, I probably wouldn't have guessed yuzu was a note at all. The ice note is surprisingly most prominent to my nose, then the peony. The rest is a bit incomprehensible, but I honestly think it's the weak longevity to blame.<br />
<br />
I'm sure the other notes balance the peony, though, as without them I think I would have decided my first sample as 'overly soapy'.<br />
<br />
On the first blind whiff of BC, I recall the opening as clean and sweet, and wholly linear down to the base notes. Perhaps a little one-dimensional for the profile-- but at least it's office-friendly. <br />
<br />
I received a few compliments from only acquaintances after later purchasing a travel-sized vial for the usual after-lunch spritz. Those who did comment also had to be relatively close, or in mumbling distance, so this one is considerably an intimate sillage.<br />
<br />
During my few days wearing BC, there wasn't much commentary or anything remarkable from friends and loved ones, even with the occasional hug or rendezvous. I think I say this as I usually love to gauge impressions from those I do know-- as I can then tell what fragrances do create a reputation. BC never did this. But it did remain mildly pleasant, and didn't 'overstay its welcome'.<br />
<br />
As a daytime fragrance, its longevity is relatively short. Maybe a few hours, at best. Still, the travel size is a good price point, especially if you're into 'cheerier' fragrances, or simply want something 'for the moment'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2199544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2199544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198296" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshieFrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2020198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshieFrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020198">FreshieFrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 14:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has got to be one of the most boring, basic, mediocre, overpriced, perfumes of all times. It is not offensive, but it smells kinda cheap and it does not last long. Suitable for a seven-year-old maybe who you want to have something light For but not for a grown woman and not worth more than $15. Otherwise youre just paying for that Versace name</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2198296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2198296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197920" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 07:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like Bright Crystal. Not as much as Crystal Noir though, which I own for years, but for a hot summer day its nice. Its a very bright, citrusy-fruity, cooling, aquatic peony centric scent. Has a  strong sweet, fruity smell from the combination of yuzu and pomegranate seeds. The floral notes carry the scent through its life, this is first and foremost a floral scent. The association of peonies with lotus flower and magnolia is truly beautiful. Light, ethereal, dewy, youthful type of flowers. A bit generic though, doesnt smell expensive.<br />
<br />
The downside of Bright Crystal is that it performs quite mediocre. Lasting power is around 5-6 hours with intimate sillage. <br />
<br />
I would recommend this to younger women, in their twenties, specially those who love a good but uncomplicated fruity floral perfume. Simple but elegant and feminine. The young, pretty girl type of perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2197920"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2197920#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The hotel had water damage and mold that someone had to tried to cover up with either perfume or a cleaning product, but the end result smelled EXACTLY like Bright Crystal. Now all I smell is a musty old cleaning product.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2197726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2197726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Rose-Oud-8070.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8070.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Oud"title="Rose Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 16:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had blooming bouquet before and saw the comparisons so wanted to try the famous Bright Crystal. Listen, a pretty peony will always be a pretty peony no matter how basic or overplayed it is. I like this! It puts me in a mid 2010s beauty guru vibe. Girly fresh and pretty and similar to so many other things, but beloved for a reason. Smells like (in the least offensive way) a young mom perfume. Like you're hip and young and pretty but still an adult and grown up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2192390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2192390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; middle note plastic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2187461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2187461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AYP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AYP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164933">AYP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No entiendo porque tantas reseas negativas, para mi este es un excelente perfume, aroma fresco y elegante para oler limpio pero no barato, tiene buena longevidad en ropa dura hasta das, la estela es moderada pero bastante buena. <br />
De mis preferidas para el verano.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2187040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2187040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The shotgun-blast of citrus prevents it from being a gentle or feminine floral; the strange, aquatic flowers and warm musk prevent it from smelling truly clean or fresh. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133417" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meliecat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/884698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.884698.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meliecat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Fleur-d-Eau-5146.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5146.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur d'Eau"title="Fleur d'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133417ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133417" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/884698">meliecat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not my type of scent, and I'm not a Versace fan anyway, but surprisingly pleasant, fresh, floral, slightly fruity. This is what you would want to wear in the summer heat if you like fresh, mainstream perfumes, but not full-blown citrusy ones like Light Blue. By the way, this has a Bi-es dupe called Diamond Sparkle, which is nearly 100% identical to the scent, but lacks its longevity big time.. Worth a try if you don't want to pay through your nose for this scent itself alone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2133417"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2133417#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VioletVampyr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VioletVampyr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Indigo-26845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Indigo"title="Indigo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350071">VioletVampyr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first perfume I ever bought, and I love it dearly. <br />
<br />
My only complaint lies in the soapiness that invades my nose and mouth when it lingers too long, or I sniff too deeply. The initial burst of fragrance is incredibly pleasant. I tend to spray it in my hair as opposed to my skin, as it allows the notes I prefer to stick around longer.<br />
I really would like to know what causes the soapy smell/taste though, because that happens with a great number of perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2125639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2125639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silkyvanilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2097431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2097431.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silkyvanilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); But dry down is kind of off putting to me. Maybe the musk and amber not sure</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2124687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2124687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="n8super"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078055"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2078055.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="n8super" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fine-ry/Before-The-Rainbow-79171.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79171.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Before The Rainbow"title="Before The Rainbow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2078055">n8super</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 06:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>starts with all the florals and fruits, mostly peony with bright yuzu and dark pomegranate. fairly quickly, the musk comes out and the fruit fades away. the floral musk is clean and pleasant, maybe a little too light and sweet for my taste. i can definitely see this smelling like champagne, i think that's a more accurate accord than "ice". there's a sharpness that i associate with alcohol in this<br />
unfortunately the sweet, sharp muskiness is the perfect storm to give me a headache, even though i do kind of enjoy how this smells. it's not a scent that would be appropriate for me anyways</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120498" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violinwood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="violinwood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085617">violinwood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was wondering why this perfume smells so "sparkly" and "rich" to me, and then I saw the ice note when I looked it up. This scent is true to its name- something about it smells like crystal chandeliers and champagne. It just sparkles. It's clean but not sharp, and fruity but not cloying. Lovely fresh scent for springtime that feels classy and upscale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2120498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2120498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
