padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933935">G0rebloom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dislike this so much, I've tried it a few times over the course of a few months. It gets lost on me within moments. I'd hoped the ice and amber notes would be interesting, but I am left feeling like this is just pink hairspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2112627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2112627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="needed_a_new_obsession"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2065390"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="needed_a_new_obsession" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Wood-Sage-Sea-Salt-25529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"title="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2065390">needed_a_new_obsession</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dear Bright Crystal, <br />
<br />
You landed in my sample inbox because of two reasons: I wanted to know what "ice"smells like - now I do, I am impressed! - and because you said you contain peony. Of that I am not impressed. For a short second or a half, some peony rushed by my nose when spraying you on my arm, and it disappeared at once. Where did you leave it?<br />
<br />
The ice I experienced as a cool "airyness", like the scentless part of a sparkling water bottle which when opened freshly reaches the nose the first time.<br />
<br />
Apart from this icyness, you are not more than a synthetic flower bouquet, you remind me of sniffing into my budget laundry detergent while at the same time chewing an airwaves gum.<br />
<br />
Quite the (short and faint) experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2112068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2112068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110810" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillaflower77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53181"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.53181.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillaflower77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Acqua-Fiorentina-The-Encore-67087.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67087.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Fiorentina The Encore"title="Acqua Fiorentina The Encore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53181">vanillaflower77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creed spring flower without the musty undertones!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2110810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2110810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109652" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tsmarcondes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1832458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tsmarcondes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Natura/Frescor-de-Pitanga-25976.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25976.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Frescor de Pitanga"title="Frescor de Pitanga"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832458">Tsmarcondes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a freshy floral. Good, playful, but I honestly think it's a bit basic, I wouldn't pay the price considering that there is a lot over there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2109652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2109652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104634" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mith/Ambery-Musk-88281.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88281.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambery Musk"title="Ambery Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even though this is a 2006 fragrance, it feels like it belongs to the 1980s. I can imagine it coming in one of those little sample pouches with the scented cloths inside. It has a bright and happy presence, but it's really basic. It's got a strong floral note, which I think could be headache-inducing to some people. There's also a waxy citrus scent, which is probably the yuzu. The magnolia note helps give the florals a rich rather than light touch. While it's not really a "me" scent, it's still okay. I'm sure there's someone out there who loves it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2104634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2104634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100110" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alicen1derland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1245282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alicen1derland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Casablanca-42181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casablanca"title="Casablanca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100110ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100110" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245282">Alicen1derland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 19:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is bright, clean, feminine, evoking sophistication. It exudes classiness and consistently earns me compliments when worn. Perfect for daytime or casual evenings, it carries a reminiscent scent of luxurious, clean-smelling shampoo, which I adore. It shares a similar clean shampoo vibe with VS Bombshell, making it a favorite in my collection.<br />
<br />
Out of the bottle I prefer the scent to Bombshell, however,  on my skin Bombshell smells much nicer on the dry down. And I love how Bright Crystal smells on my sister. Goes to show you that fragrance differs depending on individual chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2100110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2100110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091002" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I call it as a welcome spring scent. It always evoces me memories on ma 20s when I wear BC a lot. I would say this is a classy timeless clean/zingy/fruityfloral with no vanilla (that is quite rare in nowdays perfume industry) and I appreciate that. Safe blind buy, and it stays pretty long for an EDT.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2081551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2081551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kisskissdelrey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2017294.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kisskissdelrey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017294">Kisskissdelrey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very powdery to me , juvenile but mature at the same time? Its giving hot cool grandma vibesAlso smells like lotion.. Its a generic fragrance nothing special but safe I guess  Not my cup of tea ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2080252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2080252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076992" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a bunch of wet roses and green stalks, even though rose isn't listed as a note. Overall, a beautiful summer perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2067951"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2067951#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2062096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2062096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057189" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joliecat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/240658"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.240658.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joliecat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Pierre-Sand/Magical-Lamp-Gold-27628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magical Lamp Gold"title="Magical Lamp Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/240658">joliecat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 08:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright Crystal stays musky longer in winter on my skin. It's a fresh cool musk, not powdery.  In hot summer, the fruits show through more and the flowers smell sweeter.  Projection is moderate for about 2 hours, then becomes such a close to skin scent that it's virtually undetectable by anyone passing by.   Still, on skin and fabrics, Bright Crystal lasts quietly, about 6 hours.  Great for any age, to wear any time, any season.  If you want a well blended, delicate, very feminine, soft scent, this one lets you feel fresh, ladylike and pretty all day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2057189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2057189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051560" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheJester420"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1955688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheJester420" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955688">TheJester420</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is so much to like about this scent but a lot to dislike too. I find this scent to be pleasant but boring and almost too safe. The floral notes in mix with the fresh notes are enthralling at first but nauseating at second. Ive bought this perfume a few times and smelt it on others and always seem to get a bit of an unpleasant chemical undertone also. I imagine this best as something you would gift a girl for her sweet 16. This scent doesnt seem to last very long on but can always be found at discount prices so the longevity mostly isnt an issue.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2051560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2051560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2048000" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="harmonia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/62115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="harmonia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orto-Parisi/Cuoium-69923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuoium"title="Cuoium"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2048000ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2048000" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/62115">harmonia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont like to hate on fragrances, but this one rubs me the wrong way, on so many levels. Its ultra generic, brings nothing new to the table and does what its trying to do really bad. Cheap chemical musk and totally bland floral notes. The performance to price ratio is horrible. If people like it, fine, but they could do so much better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2048000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2048000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046404" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nukleo777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nukleo777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Wish-353.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.353.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wish"title="Wish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710265">nukleo777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 01:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a crispy summer perfume! Yes, it is ,,background" perfume but rather pleasant. This one I don't use to impress someone or leave a mark. This one is just for me. I enjoy it. We all love perfumes that are unique and different but sometimes you just need to take a shower and keep that fresh smell for some time. This is perfect perfume for that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2046404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2046404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChelleBelle84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.844904.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChelleBelle84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Caleche-23.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caleche"title="Caleche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/844904">ChelleBelle84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another generic, soapy scent seems to be what is most complained about with this scent. Lets think about this for a bit. <br />
<br />
Im not going to go into all the notes in this scent and what it smells like. That has been done many times over. What I am going to say is that this scent was made to be worn in the warmer months, especially in the summer. With that in mind, there are only so many fragrance notes that can be combined in such a way to create a summer scent that are not too heavy or wont become cloying in the summer heat like sweet, vanilla gourmands would. There may be some lightly sweet fruitiness, but care must be taken for it  to not become cloying. Fresh, maybe even a little tart, and being rather soapy scented is the way to go for someone who has been sweating from the heat, so it will be comfortable for both the wearer and for those around them. <br />
<br />
Not to mention, scent can also be a pick me up. If its stifling hot outside, a cool, refreshing fragrance like this one can actually perk someone up and be a bit of a relief. <br />
<br />
That is just the scent profile of many floral fruity scents like this one,, and why such scents were created. To complain that this is a generic or soapy scent is failing to understand the genre and know that in the scorching heat of summer in some places around the world, it would be TOO hot to wear anything ELSE.<br />
<br />
So now the question is, if this is generic, then what would you suggest for an alternative? What is it that youre looking for?<br />
<br />
Edit: I agree with someones review below to allow a scent to sit for a while when you first get it. I noticed that too with a lot of scents. Its like theyre mass produced, freshly made and sent out immediately. In the process they smell rather weak when you open and spray them and dont smell like you remember them. Theyre not given the time needed for all the fragrance notes to really soak in and blend together. When leaving it sit for several months, I found the scent to be stronger and better smelling. Also if theyre hot from the outdoor heat while in postal transit, try putting the fragrance in the refrigerator for a day or so. Heat speeds up the molecules of a scent where cold slows them down. This will greatly affect how a scent will smell. <br />
<br />
Edit 2: I think this was made to be an everyday soapy or shampoo type scent just to smell nice, fresh, clean, and put together. The dry down of this is like Dove pink beauty bar on me. In summer heat, this is perfect for a daytime scent. I get lots of compliments on this, most especially from members of the Hispanic community here who love nothing better than a clean, fresh smelling person. *gasp* Oh, you smell so wonderful! What IS that?! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2043874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2043874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039393" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="izzyyyzzii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1810940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="izzyyyzzii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Midnight-Fantasy-802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Fantasy"title="Midnight Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810940">izzyyyzzii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this perfume for my birthday in the summer! The packaging is beautiful, so that's always a plus. Everyone agrees here, but this smells like a bubble bath. You smell, for lack of better words, squeaky clean. It's a good smell for summer dates and lunches, but I think the bubbliness of it is too static to be worn as a nighttime perfume, since in my opinion, I prefer to wear complex perfumes that you can pick apart different scents from during nighttime. If you're a big fan of a lighter feminine scent, it's worth your money! But if not, I'd say some better options don't scream light pink like this one somewhat does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2039393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2039393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Something a middle school girl would wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2035321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2035321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="orphangirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1955890.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="orphangirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternity"title="Eternity"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955890">orphangirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 22:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont really get a lot of fruitiness from this one. Perhaps a slightly sweet citrus up front and then a clean crisp floral and about five minutes after spraying I swear I smell something grassy (mahogany?) but that gives way to an even softer, deeper floral. This smells nice. Its inoffensive and has decent projection while it lasts. I will wear this one fairly often since its very feminine and classy, but its a little too plain to ever become a signature scent and I doubt any compliments I receive on this will ever go beyond mere use of the word nice. Its just not memorable enough to be categorized as anything else.<br />
<br />
Edit: Im sorry, Bright Crystal! Now that I have worn and lived with you a few more times, I no longer find you just nice and unmemorable.  I mean, you are very nice but you are also pretty and clean and delightful. And understated, not unmemorable. And you will always have a place in my collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2035251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2035251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032994" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jadepo21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jadepo21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Lust-in-Paradise-53588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lust in Paradise"title="Lust in Paradise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289078">jadepo21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 16:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yet another generic, soapy scent that is rather headache inducing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2032994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2032994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2030966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2030966" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzanne_ronald"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzanne_ronald" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Sticky-Toffee-17926.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17926.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sticky Toffee"title="Sticky Toffee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2030966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2030966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553">suzanne_ronald</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If there was such a thing as a Raspberry Pink Peony...<br />
<br />
I just have an aged miniature of this, but it's kept surprisingly well and the performance has gotten stronger.  Opens with yuzu, pomegranate &amp; ice, that blended together read like something near freshly washed raspberries, but already the peony is swelling through that lifts and diffuses everything to a floral raspberry-blossom.  As it transitions to the heart, lotus helps to continue the aquatic freshness, while magnolia keeps everything light and fluffy.  Peony here is the real star of the show, and brings velvety, fluffy, rosy, floral &amp; fresh tones.  At times, I also get the lemon-y rosy tones of geranium. The base notes help to keep this luscious raspberry-peony going for quite awhile.  Alberto Morillas hand is evident here, and you will catch reminders of many of the scents he composed for Marc Jacobs as well as Miracle Lancme.  Performance is great for a spring-summer wearing experience, and once the bottle has aged a bit it would likely be good for year round wear.  This is one of the nicest pink fruity-floral freshies going.  For what it is, it's a love for me. 9/10.  Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2030966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2030966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2023519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2023519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tashigroom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1938405.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tashigroom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938405">tashigroom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of a slightly weaker version of Glossier You. Pretty scent but I wouldnt personally buy it again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2023320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2023320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Essie12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928676"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Essie12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fine-ry/Before-The-Rainbow-79171.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79171.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Before The Rainbow"title="Before The Rainbow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928676">Essie12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the freshest, prettiest florals you will find on the market. I'm not a girly girl and this is perfect for me... Not sweet and pungent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2022545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2022545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lovaloo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1209968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lovaloo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mitsouko-Eau-de-Parfum-25316.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25316.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"title="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968">Lovaloo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An artificial smelling, linear, and unsophisticated fruity floral. Rosy kool-aid. It has a strange industrial quality to it, texture-wise. Fuzzy, sharp, and plasticine. Aquatic floral notes can have a shrill quality, and I think that's what I'm picking up on. The base contains a powerful, acrid wood note that reminds me of sharpie markers. <br />
<br />
Bright Crystal is strong, projecting, and long lasting. The "Absolu" flanker is a less nuanced and even stronger interpretation of this DNA. There are plenty of perfumes with a similar red berry/rose scent profile that smell superior. Its popularity completely eludes me. Among the worst I've tried in this category and at this price point, I recommend steering clear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2018058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2018058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jackiekeyes99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984259"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.984259.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jackiekeyes99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-55795.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55795.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle"title="Idle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984259">Jackiekeyes99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sorry peeps,  I love this scent! Its popular for a reason!  So well blended! I love the close to the skin dry drown. Its so feminine and soft, pretty, a feeling of cozy and wanting to be in comfortable clothing comes to mind. Amazing everyday casual wear. You could dress it up or down very versatile. I think when people say it generic, they mean its not an annoying scent or offensive. So if generic is that, than yes its generic! So easy to grab everyday, so easy to wear. Doesnt weigh you down at all.<br />
Uplifting !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2017153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2017153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014123" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AinoKaroliina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1810813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AinoKaroliina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); I sense the pomegranate note, but it's not overpowering. <br />
<br />
This is not a sweet scent. This is a crisp, citrus fresh scent with floral notes for femininity.<br />
<br />
Good for summertime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="2014123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=2014123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1991814" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vmich"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1899709"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1899709.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vmich" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1991814ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1991814" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1899709">Vmich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-03">12/03/23 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Typical floral musky scent. Im surprised there are so many fruit notes listed because I did not get any of that. Also surprised its not listed as a white floral scent because it smells exactly like the past ones Ive smelt. Boring and not a fan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1991814"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1991814#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989429" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980813" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oda.grini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oda.grini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898856">oda.grini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Contrary to what most are saying, I think this is a fantastic icy winter fragrance. I use this every Christmas, because it reminds me of both the cold outside, the fresh flowers and greens we decorate with and the sparking elegance of dressing up and celebrating. I think it is beautiful as a contrast (but in a complimentary way) to the warm scents we usually have surrounding us in the winter. It reminds me of standing inside a festive decorated house filled with fresh greenery and the fireplace burning Christmas insence while looking out the window either at the beautiful snowy landscape or in the cool air at the stars at night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974232" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlowerSeeker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlowerSeeker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Magnifique-3746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magnifique"title="Magnifique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777192">FlowerSeeker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-11">11/11/23 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice clean fruity flora, not overly sweet. Can smell a little plasticy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1958388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1958388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1957622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1957622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whodoesyourtaxes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1679306.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whodoesyourtaxes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Lavender-Martini-7717.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7717.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lavender Martini"title="Lavender Martini"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1957622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1957622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1679306">whodoesyourtaxes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-21">10/21/23 12:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I definitely understand using the word "safe" to describe this perfume, and I reluctantly understand "boring" as well, but I just don't care. This perfume always smells so good to me! I don't wear it a lot anymore because it's not a very "me" scent, but I always LOVE smelling it on someone else-- I always smile to myself if I recognize the scent when I'm out somewhere. And if I am in the mood for a fresh, feminine, almost girly vibe, this one never disappoints. This has always read as a very fruity floral to me; the pomegranate note stands out a lot, making it bright (lol) and good for any season. If Bright Crystal has a million fans, I'm one of them. If Bright Crystal has no fans, I'm dead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1957622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1957622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
