But alone it is just a little too young for my 30's self.  I started layering it with Estee Lauder's Modern Muse and now it feels right.  More my age but keeps the light, carefree aspect that appeals to me in Bright Crystal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1947757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1947757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941342" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Claugregg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1439753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Claugregg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439753">Claugregg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-30">09/30/23 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells so pink. Fun fact.. it is the FIRST designer fragrance I bought, after lurking the Sephora perfume section for months. If you're a teenager or you have a teen daughter, this is a very great first "big girl" perfume. It is fruity, it is fresh and it is fun. Very feminine and easy to like. You just can't expect any sophistication with it, since it is quite an easy smell for everyone. Also the kind of perfume a boyfriend would like. Reminds me of a very strong, icy punch juice. What kind of perfume has ice in their notes anyway??? Is it worth the price? Yes, for my 15 years old self. Not now though, my taste has changed with time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1941342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1941342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1940567" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SundayGirl07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194930.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SundayGirl07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1940567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1940567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194930">SundayGirl07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-29">09/29/23 16:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean floral. Pretty linear and a safe blind buy. I swear I smell a hint of rose in this but the notes don't say rose? Not like 'rose water' smelling rose but a blended rose. It's not anything 'special' in terms of being complex but it still smells really nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1940567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1940567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ive never seen the hype around this one. The only way I can describe this is like, imagine stepping outside and looking directly into the sun, thats how the smell of this perfume makes me feel lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Almost like it's meant to be layered and not worn on its own. To me it feels like it needs something to give it some body or round it out. Happy I don't have a entire bottle to work through.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1935269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1935269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1934085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1934085" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AncientModernAncient"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AncientModernAncient" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/DKNY-Be-Tempted-39240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DKNY Be Tempted"title="DKNY Be Tempted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1934085ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1934085" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719">AncientModernAncient</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why does this smell so aquatic on me, to the point where it's off-putting? My only guess is the ice note. It doesn't even smell floral on me - I expected something simple, sweet, clean, but this is so oddly marine and a little sharp/plastic. It's totally me and not the perfume, but I find it unwearable. I feel like this would be completely inoffensive on anyone otherwise.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1934085"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1934085#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Feminine. Republican college girl with straight A's. That's kinda it, that's the vibe. It's just not special. Very inoffensive, office-safe. Its a good workout/running errands scent, so it smells clean but not soapy. I ended up giving it to my mom, who works in an office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1930155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1930155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930059" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Einfinken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1840930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Einfinken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Santal-Blanc-55226.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55226.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Blanc"title="Santal Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); It's a fine, inoffensive summer fragrance but overall really underwhelming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1930059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1930059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925015" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HippyDippy57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HippyDippy57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/So-Scandal-60942.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60942.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Scandal!"title="So Scandal!"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700008">HippyDippy57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-11">09/11/23 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a tiny trial size bottle of this, and initially smelling the perfume in the bottle, I wasn't expecting this to last very long when applied.  I certainly get the aquatic nature of this scent, and love the peony/magnolia notes.  I dabbed some of this on my clothes, and was pleasantly surprised that I could still smell it 6 to 7 hours later.  It is not a dramatic scent; more crisp and clean and certainly has a place in my collection, as I would definitely wear this at Zumba and the gym - something fresh, unobtrusive and feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1925015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1925015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923549" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumepearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumepearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/OUAI/Melrose-Place-52552.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52552.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melrose Place"title="Melrose Place"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886">perfumepearl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This wasn't for me. To my nose it smells very sharp and almost like alcohol. I'm not sure which note made it smell bitter. It doesn't remind me of Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet that I love. I wanted to love this but it just didn't work. The longevity is good for an edt, lasts about 5-6h on skin. <br />
I don't think that anyone should blind but this. On my friend this smells beautiful fresh and clean, but it just didn't work for me. I would rate it like 3/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1923549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1923549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Madame Le Nez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1834043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Madame Le Nez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834043">Madame Le Nez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Try it again, but an older batch.<br />
When I smelled Versace Bright Crystal at a fragrance counter and subsequently sampled it, my nose liked it. However, when I got a full bottle something was different. The scent from the full bottle was airy, a bit alcoholy on the initial spray, the notes were not as rich and distinct in the dry down. The batch I have was made early 2023. Am I on to something here reviewers? I think there's something about perfume maturation that should be talked about more. People could be misrepresenting the beauty of a perfume because it wasn't give time to marinate. <br />
<br />
When I get an older batch, I'll update my review.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1923233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1923233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But it is too dominantly floral for my tastes. No disrespect to Mr. morillas who does quality work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1923070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1923070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My husband bought me this as a gift when it was half price so I never really researched it. Its probably my most rarely used perfume, but its beautiful in its basicity. When I feel like I want to wear something but not stand out, I put this on. Its great for everyday use, for a sunny day, when you arent really up to anything. Simple, floral, fresh, not long-lasting. Its very safe to use and not ever be hated lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1922446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1922446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1921742" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MySkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1520127.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MySkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/724-75754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="724"title="724"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1921742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1921742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); The trend of "suffocate everyone around you" perfumery is only for people who have nothing else to impress with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1921742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1921742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; She's never been a perfume gal, but really likes this stuff.<br />
Fresh, clean, flowery and softly feminine.<br />
Not overbearing and good for everyday wear.<br />
Possibly a bit generic, but a safe blind buy for those who like lighter, clean, floral fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1921414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1921414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1900534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1900534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tayschuett"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516504"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516504.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tayschuett" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516504">tayschuett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a love/hate relationship with this fragrance. I exclusively wear this on and after my morning summer walks when I know Ill be sweating. But when I begrudgingly grab for it, with my sneakers, sunglasses and Fanny pack on , I roll my eyes with disgust. I just dont like it, not at all. On that initial spray, its reminiscent of cleaning products, but as it dries down it turns into a clean soft floral. And when mixed with beading sweat, <br />
<br />
It really comes alive into something refreshing and palatable. Its simply mundane. I wouldnt wear this fragrance anywhere else, especially not for something special. With all being said, i enjoy this fragrance as much as I dislike it. In my eyes, it evens out to just fine. But keep in mind, I am a Gourmand lover but dont want to be choked out in the heat by the cloying sweetness of my favorites. If not for that, this clean-refreshing scent would not be for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1899998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1899998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1896964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896964" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lidell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/285793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.285793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lidell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-Rouge-68404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/285793">Lidell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-08">08/08/23 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The early Y2K Clean Girl.<br />
Smells like laundry in a sharp, soapy, cold way, but, for some reason, it leaves an actually pretty and elegant scent trail. Now you probably find more interesting and better-performing scents in this category, however, Bright Crystal is still something one will always be complimented on because it is... well, clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1896964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1896964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1892882" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="haus0fXI"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653985.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="haus0fXI" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Eau-de-Toilette-65936.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65936.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Eau de Toilette"title="Libre Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1892882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1892882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653985">haus0fXI</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-02">08/02/23 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just gotta say: That first initial spray  PURE ALCOHOL.<br />
I actually coughed cause it was intense. But that dry down is such a pretty scent.<br />
Now, I had to return this because of the dry down. Oddly enough.<br />
Though its a pretty fragrance, its generic. <br />
I usually am curious on why this resells so cheap and I kinda see the point.<br />
If youre starting off in the world of fragrances and want a safe buy, get this.<br />
Its girly, sweet and floral.<br />
<br />
Maybe at some point, Ill repurchase this and enjoy it but at the moment, I feel like I have maybe something similar like this in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
i truly believe so much of the bright crystal hate is just born out of peoples i-must-be-different complex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1887712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1887712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882347" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luanneog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luanneog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949">luanneog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-19">07/19/23 12:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells clean, soapy like out of shower or bubble bath. It's floral with subdued citrus. It's not my scent profile, I find it a bit generic, unremarkable and done before. Not bad by any means, just not unique in any way. However, my girl loves this type of scents and loved this one immediately when she sampled it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1882347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1882347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feuermaiden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1684821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feuermaiden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boy-Smells/Woodphoria-75837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Woodphoria"title="Woodphoria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1684821">feuermaiden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright Crystal - probably the most generic smelling perfumey perfume in existence. <br />
<br />
Smelling this brings me memories of shopping in department store fragrance counters around the Holidays, smelling all the designer perfumes, and they all tended to mix together into whatever Bright Crystal is. Its girly, its pink, its flowery. Its something I can envision Barbie wearing. Its the high end shampoo they use on you in the salon that you end up buying before you leave. <br />
<br />
Or as my husband sums it up - smells like an accessible perfume from Sears. <br />
<br />
BC is unlikely to offend anyone - its fresh, pretty, and clean smelling. Simple and effective if thats what youre looking for, but totally not my style or personality. <br />
<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1880354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1880354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KrisGreen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478052.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KrisGreen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Crystal-Noir-631.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.631.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crystal Noir"title="Crystal Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478052">KrisGreen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive mainly reviewed the EDP Even after the 2021 reformulation. Im the kinda guy who sweats a lot and this stuff stays on me longer than any other fragrance I own. It goes well with classic male fragrances like Drakkor Noir, toning down some of the harshness to some scents. The EDT used to smell strong and classy right after your first sprays before the big reformulation. My first big 6.7 ounce bottle in 2022 with the new packaging I was turned off, sad they ruined a masterpiece. Or so I thought. <br />
<br />
This time I let a 2022 bottle sit for 12-13 months, savouring my vintage EDT as long as I could. It was weak and had poor longevity after being altered. This now requires months to sit before you see its true beast. I got a travelling spray 5 months ago, it was very weak and smelled anemic despite smelling nice. Today it smells strong and has the same character I know and love. <br />
<br />
I always used to call this a safe blind but not anymore. This is one of those fragrances that HAS to sit to experience its true potential. However it was chemically altered I dont know. BUT if youre someone who has a lot of fragrances in rotation, come back to this one months later, its night and day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1880341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1880341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="XOXO_marcel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="XOXO_marcel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tous/Tous-Gems-Party-66524.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66524.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tous Gems Party"title="Tous Gems Party"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392">XOXO_marcel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice little fragrance. It's soft, floral, and has a touch of a fresh "grape" scent. Super lightweight; you'd have to just about bathe in it to make it noticeable.<br />
<br />
If you love this but want something stronger (and cheaper), try "My Dynastie Princess" by Marina de Bourbon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1875019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1875019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872688" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872688" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CowLover99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CowLover99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dana/Love-s-Baby-Soft-9401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love's Baby Soft"title="Love's Baby Soft"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872688ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872688" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786472">CowLover99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 11:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this perfume. I can definitely smell the pomegranate. I wouldn't say it's sweet, but it is girly with some floral scents. It is a crisp and refreshing scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1872688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1872688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872263" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Splendor-89.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Splendor"title="Splendor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-05">07/05/23 23:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't remember if I've ever reviewed this fragrance in the past.<br />
I don't own a full bottle, rather a mini; my second one if I'm not mistaken.<br />
I don't really find anything that compelling here but every now and then I crave this fragrance,<br />
What is unusual about it, is how it performs for me.<br />
It doesn't take center stage for long, becoming a skin scent rather quickly, but then it hovers persistently in the background providing a slightly sharp floral freshness that I find uplifting and refreshing, especially in hot weather.<br />
What is really amazing is how long this fragrance lasts on me -  a few dabs from my mini will last literally the entire day, well into the late night.<br />
I've tried the absolute version too but, although very similar to the OG, I found the wood note in it slightly too synthetic for me and the overall fragrance a tad too loud for my preference. I gifted my mini of that one to DD.<br />
This version though is one I might buy a full bottle of when my current mini runs out, providing the reformulation hasn't changed the scent too drastically. My mini predates the implementation of the IFRA Lilial ban.<br />
<br />
Update - 2/24 - I had occasion to sample the new post-IFRA rendition of Bright Crystal and I don't detect a major shift in the scent at all, so thank goodness for that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1872263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1872263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869704" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eva Wu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054759"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1054759.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eva Wu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Balenciaga/Florabotanica-15512.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15512.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florabotanica"title="Florabotanica"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054759">Eva Wu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-02">07/02/23 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, Versace in fashion represents the mistress, the baddie, the minx.<br />
<br />
No matter how trashy some people might find their designs, for me they are always at the very least distinctive (the medusa prints? those chunky heels? LOVE)<br />
<br />
So why on earth are their perfumes SO generic?? And I'd accept generic if they were at the very least pleasant.<br />
<br />
This damn thing smells like a peony-scented hand sanitiser, with a bleached, citrusy-fruity top note that belongs in a Hello Kitty body spray. And the lumpy, tacky pink bottle screams bachelorette party favour.<br />
<br />
I have no idea how to account for its massive success. Then again, in my drunken college years I was convinced that dancing on tables at parties was cute and not obnoxious, so I guess we can chalk it up to youthful recklessness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1869704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1869704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Flowery, but a bit aquatic and fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1866146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1866146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864238" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232139">Szafirowy czar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-19">06/19/23 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not a bad fragrance but a bit overwhelming for me. Also, not very unique</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1859918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1859918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1858779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585989">AuthenticAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-17">06/17/23 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got a purse spray today and i really like this. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1855483" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudebora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735350"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1735350.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudebora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1855483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1855483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735350">eaudebora</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-13">06/13/23 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unfortunately I wanted to like this one so bad and <br />
I almost blind bought it but thank god I didnt.<br />
<br />
its so so so boring, there is nothing unique or special about this. the bottle is cute but thats about it. save ur money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1855483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1855483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HannahRosesAreRed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HannahRosesAreRed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684">HannahRosesAreRed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this more. Bright Crystal is such a lovely, pretty, inoffensive and lovable fragrance. The scent matches the jeweled, pink bottleit's vibrant and sparkly. Sweet but not too sweet, cooling and fresh but not too cold. It's fruity, juicy and piquant. I love those aquatic floral notes of sugary, rosy peony and watery magnolia. The touch of waxiness from the lotus is inspired. The blond woods are gentle and nice. Bright Crystal could have been perfect. But it suffers from one crippling weakness, one shared with so many of this luxury label: Its tragic longevity. <br />
<br />
It's a good story that ends too abruptly. It's nice while it lasts, but it doesn't last long. Bright Crystal lasted just over an hour before it vanished on my skin, and even then, it was so intimate that I had to overspray to notice it. Versace baffles me sometimes. They know how to make fantastic scents but they just do not last. The only one with any staying power is Crystal Noir. I don't get it.<br />
<br />
I love Bright Crystal. But it's so ephemeral that I can't justify myself buying this. Sure, it's not Jo Malone levels of weak, but still. I want my rosy fresh fragrances to last a little longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1852923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1852923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1851099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760676">princessproxy101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 01:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A refreshing scent, I love to wear this in the summer. Smells clean, citrusy, rosey, sweet, and aquatic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1845611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1845611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeyedclover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1758124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeyedclover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758124">honeyedclover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 19:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Classy, demure, refreshing. The definition of a clean, floral fragrance. I have memories of sneaking into my mom's room in the morning before 8th grade and high school (later 2010s), snatching this off her dresser, and applying it. I would instantly feel uplifted by its bright, positive notes. It is simply just girly florals, fresh fruits, and a little aquatic. Kind of like what one may smell like just stepping out of the shower after using a generic flowery body wash and an invigorating fruity shampoo; the smell of cleanliness as she goes to frolic in her lush garden with a cornucopia of spring and summer fruits, some still just blossoms. It is definitely a daytime fragrance, ironically though, nowadays, I enjoy using it as a bedtime perfume, just to get the feel of a clean, floral haze as I lay my head down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1844721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1844721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1840121" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dj71"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721315"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1721315.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dj71" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/XOXO/Mi-Amore-17853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mi Amore"title="Mi Amore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1840121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1840121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721315">dj71</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-23">05/23/23 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have an older sample of this, so I'm not sure if I'm smelling the most current formulation, but I really enjoy this scent!   As someone who is getting bored of my usual scent preferences (normally sweet gourmand), this is such a nice uplifting fresh scent.  Not really any sweetness and that's what I like about it!  I also feel like the top three accords listed on here really are correct (sometimes, I don't smell the accords as listed on some fragrances).  It does smell like a good combo of floral, fresh and citrus balanced nicely together.  It's not a super heavy scent either, so would be appropriate office/work scent in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1840121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1840121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However  I bought the new Spring set on line from a very legit store and I guess BC has been reformulated once again as it smells frutier sweeter and not so airy acquatic as it used to, kinda flat too. I wonder if this difference has been noticed by BC long time users if so I would love to know.Even the body lotion and shower gel included  in the set did not smell like old BC version</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
