padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1839817" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mysticmauve"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1748633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mysticmauve" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1839817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1839817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748633">mysticmauve</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-23">05/23/23 04:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my all time fave perfumes ! I bought it back in 2006 and used a couple of bottles (50 ml and 30 ml). Really hate that it became so popular though... ugh. Overall I tend to really enjoy combination of peony, rose and/or magnolia on one side and litchi, watermelon or pomegranate on the other with musk or vanilla/amber base. Easy and elegant, floral with a fruity aquatic note and powdery and a bit woody as it dries down, gosh I love it so much ! Bright Crystal is like spring in the bottle for me. I dont smell anything shampoo-like or too generic at all and Im very sensitive to smells overall (hence prefer lighter perfumes otherwise its too much). It will always be one of my faves regardless. Also I tend to look for similar-ish perfumes now just to give Bright Crystal a break now and then :) Luckily there are quite a few that smell somewhat similar to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1839817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1839817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1838134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Edit: However... It doesn't last long on my skin. It's a shame</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1838134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1838134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831718" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sarahlen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1746904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sarahlen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1746904">Sarahlen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Surprised that this was OK. Not for me but I get it. Perfect name, Bright, sparkling, peppery. Not unique in any way but sort of bc it doesn't fall into that horrible floraly, orange, rose amber musk thing that almost all other mid range perfumes do. I feel like this is truly an in offensive fragrance a good one for ppl who don't know what to wear.  Younger for sure. something slightly clean about this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1831718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1831718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1828826" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meriel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745939"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1745939.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meriel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Beautiful-Belle-50793.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50793.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beautiful Belle"title="Beautiful Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1828826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1828826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745939">meriel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-09">05/09/23 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this when I was younger because I absolutely loved a sample of it, but it never smelt quite the same. It is a little soapy on me, almost powdery, but I don't mind it if I'm in a clean/fresh mood. Honestly wish it was more floral- on me, I can't smell the lotus or magnolia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1828826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1828826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Got a tiny bottle, and on me it did not smell like that. It became a little bit annoying, and i could not put my finger on what perfume reminded me of. Finally I remembered - BEBE Glam Platinum! I do not know why it is not in Fragrantica's library, but it smells exactly like this perfume, which I have. I just do not get annoyed by BEBE one, Versace- is a different story. Returned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1823061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1823061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very refreshing and summery. Smells like a vacation. It doesnt work on my skin though. Turns sour after a while. It smells very pretty, clean, like straight out of the dryer clothes with a hint of flowers. I wish i could wear it but it doesn last either. i would recommend you get a sample before buying since some people hate it and other love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1821643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1821643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1821063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1821063" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violeteme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violeteme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/Sisley-Eau-de-3-5852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sisley Eau de 3"title="Sisley Eau de 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1821063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1821063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189">violeteme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-29">04/29/23 17:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The mother of all nowadays pink niche bottles with the same accord of fresh, chemical, sweet peony or rose. If you like Delina especially La Rosee, Lust in Paradise, Gold Coast, test this too. Or vice versa. This is not a natural peony, it is a fresh, aquatic, fruity floral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1821063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1821063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820238" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820238" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820238ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820238" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>BC is by no means a bad fragrance, at least not in my world. And indeed, I believe there are absolutely times and places for perfumes along these lines. However, I don't find it stirring in the least. It's purely "pleasant", and that truly is the extent of it for me.<br />
<br />
I smell a very watery peony along with some citruses in the opening, but the citrus accords don't actually evaporate that quickly, they actually stick around for an hour or two. However, this remains notably light and close to the skin. <br />
<br />
It really does dry into the all-too-familiar clean floral&amp;musk base that we've all probably smelled multiple, multiple times. It's definitely refreshing though, and since this predates a lot of similar fragrances, I think we do need to credit this. Other things have copied this DNA, and not necessarily as much the other way around. <br />
<br />
Longevity isn't fantastic, but on hot days, gym trips or places where fragrance sensitivities are at large, this could work well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1820238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1820238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="632" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent730567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc730567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="janeofdoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/916458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.916458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="janeofdoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Black-Orchid-1018.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1018.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Orchid"title="Black Orchid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma730567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd730567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/916458">janeofdoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-08-07">08/07/16 15:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why this "nothing special" perfume is special to me:<br />
<br />
My fiance took a path in life that didn't pan out the way he had planned.  25 years in the music industry and construction.  He decided at the ripe age of 43 that he would go to college to be a teacher. With a full time job, it's been hard to get classes in, so he's been sucking it up, and taking one class per semester, at night, after grueling weather conditions, building houses. <br />
<br />
The honors society recognized that he was a straight A student and asked him if he would like to join phi theta kappa.  What an honor! He joined,  and for the first time, I saw a glimpse of proudness in his eyes. <br />
<br />
Then...He has to be inducted into it....which meant he would have to stand with the rest of the people who joined, in front of everyone.  I guess that is too embarrassing for "rock stars" to do, I don't know. Haha!<br />
<br />
So we walk in, the room is filled with 20 something year old people,  with their proud parents and grandparents....and what filled the air from the 20 something year old girls was "bright crystal". Just a happy, comforting scent that seemed to smell like "sweet success" in a sense. He's walking in a single file with the youngsters and I could see it in his eyes..."why do I have to do this dumb sh*t, I am (now) 45 years old!". He is standing with his society brothers and sisters repeating these "code of honor" words,  and in that moment,  I felt so proud.  He is my love, my light, My everything. The "bright crystal" that flowed through the air that night will always bring me back to that proud moment in both of our lives. I just bought a bottle :) <br />
<br />
Nothing special?  Maybe to you....but it definitely is special for me. This scent is clean,  beautiful, innocent,   light, crisp, with the slightest hint of enchantment.  This is not my usual style,  I am more of an orientals kind of gal...but I think it's beautiful. Just like his bright eyes. He will graduate around 50 years old (because of balancing a full time job) and I will definitely be wearing bright crystal at graduation.  I love you, John</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="730567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=730567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1157448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1157448" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Balletflowers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/629628"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.629628.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Balletflowers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Roses-Vanille-15210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Roses Vanille"title="Roses Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1157448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1157448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/629628">Balletflowers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-22">03/22/20 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For those that are complaining this is too basic, generic, nothing special, please consider those that are sensitive to scents, not everyone wants to wear a scent thats overbearing, so strong that people across the room can smell you. Its a pretty, soft, sophisticated smell &amp; thats good enough for many.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1157448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1157448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1887712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1887712" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heliotropeking"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1641935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heliotropeking" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Pear-Inc-66120.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66120.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pear Inc"title="Pear Inc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1887712ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1887712" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641935">heliotropeking</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-26">07/26/23 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i really dont understand why people hate this fragrance so much, its clean, soapy and nice.<br />
<br />
i truly believe so much of the bright crystal hate is just born out of peoples i-must-be-different complex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1887712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1887712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent691881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc691881" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CaitM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CaitM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma691881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd691881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/996448">CaitM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-30">03/30/16 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my signature scent, and has been since 2007! <br />
<br />
Let me start off by saying I am a VERY picky person when it comes to scents. I have an extremely sensitive sense of smell, and am very hard to please where perfumes are concerned. Back in 2007, I searched high and low for a new signature. I spent many days at the mall, smelling hundreds of different perfumes in person. Until I found this, that is. The first time I smelled this, I was hands down in LOVE. I knew it was the one instantly and I bought it on the spot. <br />
<br />
In the last 4 or so years, I have made many attempts to venture outward and find myself a new signature, and in all that time, I have not found a single scent that I feel is worthy of replacing this as my signature. In the 9 years I've been wearing Bright Crystal, I get compliments on it almost daily. I remember when I first bought it, I spritzed it on immediately, and went home where my family was too, in awe! My mother loved it, my grandmother loved it, my aunt who doesn't even wear perfumes loved it! So much so, that both my mother and grandmother went out that week and bought themselves a bottle! <br />
<br />
This is a FRESH and clean smell. It's very floral in nature, but not at all overpowering. I think it's balanced gorgeously and is very sensual, yet 'sparkly' - I truly feel like I glow when I wear it, it's very warm. When first applying, it gives off a nice hint of lotus and pomegranate, and after some time, really lays on smooth with a soft amber smell, with very slight musk. The longevity is great, lasts me all day and night and the layers of each note just melt off beautifully, revealing an even more sensual scent. I think it's a great anytime perfume, day and night - all seasons - although I think it is more of a summer scent. <br />
<br />
And since I have met my partner, it seems I'll never be allowed to change it now! Which I am fine with, as I'm very much a creature of habit :P</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="691881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=691881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent605998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc605998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Valleyofthedolls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.368612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Valleyofthedolls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/J-adore-210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="J'adore"title="J'adore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma605998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd605998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368612">Valleyofthedolls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-06-21">06/21/15 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Truth be told, I am a sucker for this type of scent: fresh, feminine and a little sweet. <br />
<br />
For me, nothing beats the showered/shampooed hair feeling.This isn't a statement fragrance. It's more like tranquil music as background. A sunny bright (oops!) day at the park. For the girl wearing a white sundress,her hair up in a pony tail while having an ice cream cone. This adds the perfect final touch before you run out the door to face the dirty, gritty city. It's that little extra sparkle.You'll feel fresh and put together. You won me over Bright Crystal and you didn't even have to try too hard.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="605998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=605998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="632" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1044953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1044953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melissa_T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1161610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melissa_T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Perfect-Elixir-96014.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96014.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perfect Elixir"title="Perfect Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1044953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1044953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161610">Melissa_T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-26">03/26/19 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had a bottle of this and I don't remember where/how I got it but this was before my fragrance obsession started. I didn't give it a chance and I ended up trading it. Of course once my obsession grew I instantly regretted getting rid of my bottle. I'm rather frugal when it comes to my fragrances &amp; I knew I'd never get another bottle.<br />
<br />
Fast forward to this past weekend. I met with a fellow fragrance lover for coffee and perfume swap. She was so kind to gift me a huge 3oz bottle. I was so happy to get my hands on this again.<br />
<br />
Bright Crystal is uber feminine, gorgeous and flirty yet sophisticated. It's airy and light. Gorgeous fruity floral that is definitely a crowd pleaser and perfect for any occasion. This will be perfect for the spring weather <br />
<br />
I'm a lover of super sweet &amp; super fruity (sometimes considered juvenile) candy like scents but this might be an exception and possibly be my signature. <br />
<br />
Absolutely gorgeous!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="1044953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=1044953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent860443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc860443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SheTurtle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/94571"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.94571.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SheTurtle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma860443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd860443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/94571">SheTurtle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-12">09/12/17 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meh.<br />
<br />
When I go to the perfume counter, this one smells like ten to fifteen other "modern" scents on the counter.  I am sampling this today, and I am immediately turned off by the opening harsh citrus note.  You may call it clean; I call it annoying.  Within a half hour, I catch some slight floral notes, but I suppose the dry down is okay.  <br />
<br />
Not my kind of scent.  Not a head turner, and not at all sexy or mysterious.  Good for schoolgirls, but not a woman's scent.  Weak silage, and zero staying power.<br />
<br />
Pass.  Stick to clothing and purses, Versace.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="860443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=860443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent991174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fast forward two days, I tried it on my skin and ended up smelling like grandpa's aftershave. Terrible mismatch in chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="991174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=991174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent845194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc845194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julia-Gayle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1073102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julia-Gayle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Wood-Sage-Sea-Salt-25529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"title="Wood Sage & Sea Salt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma845194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd845194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073102">Julia-Gayle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-26">07/26/17 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells so generic, the same notes in my shampoo/conditioner. Gee, are you sure Redken didn't create this?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="845194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=845194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent731218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc731218" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Edemay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918978"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.918978.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Edemay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Rose-Gourmand-For-Her-63268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Gourmand For Her"title="Rose Gourmand For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma731218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd731218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918978">Edemay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-08-09">08/09/16 21:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Surprised the sillage is rated so low for this.<br />
This really does fill a room<br />
Great for those that love it, terrible for those that don't<br />
I personally can't stand it, too screechy and sour<br />
Had an ex friend that use to always wear this, it was a sillage bomb.<br />
Just today someone came into work with it on and I could smell it from 4m away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="632"comment_id="731218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html?ccid=731218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="632" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>

                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">23.&nbsp;</span>

    $(document).ready(function () {

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
